channel.title: Third clearnet debian guest kvm for 3g modem there will increase security if give internet to whonix?
channel.description: If create a debian guest in kvm with normaly clearnet network and plug there the 3g modem , and that give then the network to gateway whonix , that will increase security ? -because evry networks will virtualized?

item.title: Third clearnet debian guest kvm for 3g modem there will increase security if give internet to whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If you agree with https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Anonymous_3G_modem then it might. However, it’s unsupported. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#What_do_you_mean_by_unsupported.3F )

item.title: Third clearnet debian guest kvm for 3g modem there will increase security if give internet to whonix?
item.dc:creator: anonymityISright
item.description:
I allready read the link, but i write for litle diferent situation : Normaly the whonix gateway take internet from host , if will take internet from a virtual machine (debian) that will increase security? *a virtualmachine differs from a host (non virtualmachine) thank you.

item.title: Third clearnet debian guest kvm for 3g modem there will increase security if give internet to whonix?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

sorry but could you rephrase your question, it’s very hard to understand. However, regarding 3G, read this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Anonymous_3G_modem

Have a nice day,

Ego
